citation: U.S. EIA, Annual Energy Outlook 2025, Reference Case
note: Projected US national average grid emission factor trajectory. Decline driven by coal retirements and renewable capacity additions.

reference.description: Reference case based on current policies and market trends

high_renewables.description: Accelerated renewable deployment scenario (IRA incentives extended)

low_renewables.description: Slower transition scenario (policy uncertainty, grid constraints)
